devicefields.name: CONTROLS_ID
devicefields.note: Well-known value. Uniquely identifies this as a sunspec model controls (123)

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_L
devicefields.note: Length of sunspec model controls (123)

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_Conn_WinTms
devicefields.note: Time window for connect/disconnect.

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_Conn_RvrtTms
devicefields.note: Timeout period for connect/disconnect.

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_Conn
devicefields.note: Enumerated valued.  Connection control.

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_WMaxLimPct
devicefields.note: Set power output to specified level.

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_WMaxLimPct_WinTms
devicefields.note: Time window for power limit change.

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_WMaxLimPct_RvrtTms
devicefields.note: Timeout period for power limit.

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_WMaxLimPct_RmpTms
devicefields.note: Ramp time for moving from current setpoint to new setpoint.

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_WMaxLim_Ena
devicefields.note: Enumerated valued.  Throttle enable/disable control.

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_OutPFSet
devicefields.note: Set power factor to specific value - cosine of angle.

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_OutPFSet_WinTms
devicefields.note: Time window for power factor change.

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_OutPFSet_RvrtTms
devicefields.note: Timeout period for power factor.

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_OutPFSet_RmpTms
devicefields.note: Ramp time for moving from current setpoint to new setpoint.

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_OutPFSet_Ena
devicefields.note: Enumerated valued.  Fixed power factor enable/disable control.

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_VArWMaxPct
devicefields.note: Reactive power in percent of WMax.

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_VArMaxPct
devicefields.note: Reactive power in percent of VArMax.

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_VArAvalPct
devicefields.note: Reactive power in percent of VArAval.

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_VArPct_WinTms
devicefields.note: Time window for VAR limit change.

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_VArPct_RvrtTms
devicefields.note: Timeout period for VAR limit.

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_VArPct_RmpTms
devicefields.note: Ramp time for moving from current setpoint to new setpoint.

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_VArPct_Mod
devicefields.note: Enumerated value. VAR percent limit mode.

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_VArPct_Ena
devicefields.note: Enumerated valued.  Percent limit VAr enable/disable control.

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_WMaxLimPct_SF
devicefields.note: Scale factor for power output percent.

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_OutPFSet_SF
devicefields.note: Scale factor for power factor.

devicefields.name: CONTROLS_VArPct_SF
devicefields.note: Scale factor for reactive power percent.
